name: Dark Matter (itch) (August Hemback)
description:
Lore/Backstory

(viewable ingame)

You have lost yourself in the dark matter of space and need to head back to your world. In order to do this you need to collect energy orbs to power your ships portal generator.

But there's a catch, your portal generator is unstable and it's unlikely it will generate the portal near you. Therefore a navigation arrow will guide you when the portal has been opened.

The longer you stay the more attention you will draw to yourself, but also the more score you will get...

Controls:

(viewable from pause menu)

-[A] or [D] keys to turn

-[W] to thrust forward

-[Space] to shoot Laaazeers!

-[Shift] to convert your energy to health

-[Control] to generate portal * - only possible at full energy*

-[+] or [-] to zoom in and out
